title: Dark Artist armor
summaries: The Dark Artist armor is a magic-oriented armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 2250000*225 [img:Defender Medal] in total, after Golem has been defeated. The set consists of the Dark Artist's Hat, Dark Artist's Robe and Dark Artist's Leggings.
A full set of Dark Artist armor will provide the following stats:

• +42 defense
  • +25% magic damage
  • +60% minion damage
  • +25% magic critical strike chance
  • +15% mana cost reduction
  • +20% movement speed
  • +3 extra sentry slots

Additionally, wearing the full set will increase the attack range of Flameburst sentry summons by 50%, allowing them to attack up to 84 tiles away. It also increases their projectiles' velocity by 40%, increases projectiles' explosion area from 6×6 to 13×13-tile rectangle, and increases these sentries' field of view significantly.
Wearing the full set also increases the explosion area of the Phantom Phoenix's Phoenix projectile from 6×6 to 13×13-tile rectangle.
The Dark Artist armor set is an upgrade of the Apprentice armor set.

statistics.Set Bonus:
Increases your max number of sentries
Greatly enhances Flameburst effectiveness
statistics.Buy: 225 [img:Defender Medal] (set)
